last_episode_to_air.name: American Idol Parody Clip Show
last_episode_to_air.overview: The housemates compete in musical performance in order to stay in the Drawn Together house.
last_episode_to_air.production_code: Therapy unearths a repressed memory from Foxxy's past. Xandir gives Toot a makeover.

name: Drawn Together
overview: The world's first animated reality series gathers icons from all corners of the cartoon universe and lets them loose, with plenty of cameras to catch their exploits. Here's what happens when eight cartoon characters stop being polite and start getting real.

episodes.name: Hot Tub
episodes.overview: When the roommates move in, Clara offends Foxxy after assuming she's the house servant.

episodes.name: Clara's Dirty Little Secret
episodes.overview: Clara's roommates attempt to find her Prince Charming after she reveals a dark secret.

episodes.name: Gay Bash
episodes.overview: The roommates encourage Xandir to discover his true sexual identity.

episodes.name: Requiem for a Reality Show
episodes.overview: When the roommates are forced to participate in a food challenge, relationships are tested.

episodes.name: The Other Cousin
episodes.overview: The roommates get a surprise family visitor. Toot, Wooldoor and Xandir abuse Ling-Ling.

episodes.name: Dirty Pranking No. 2
episodes.overview: Spanky teaches Clara to step outside of her comfort zone, while Xandir and Captain Hero bond.

episodes.name: The One Wherein There Is a Big Twist
episodes.overview: The housemates rise up against the dreaded "Reality TV Twist."

episodes.name: The One Wherein There Is A Big Twist (2)
episodes.overview: The surviving roommates return home to cast a new roommate.

episodes.name: Foxxy vs. the Board of Education
episodes.overview: Foxxy challenges the Board of Education, and Spanky and Xandir embark on a sham marriage for insurance

episodes.name: Little Orphan Hero
episodes.overview: Captain Hero delves into his origins, while the housemates go into suicide business.

episodes.name: Captain Hero's Marriage Pact
episodes.overview: Captain Hero and Wooldoor battle over Unusually Flexible Girl, and Foxxy has a run-in with Foxxy 5.

guest_stars.character: Foxxy Dark / Foxxy Phat / Foxxy Yella / Lil Foxxy (voice)
guest_stars.name: Cree Summer

episodes.name: Clum Babies
episodes.overview: Wooldoor discovers the healing powers of his bodily fluids. Ling-Ling finds love.

episodes.name: Ghostesses in the Slot Machine
episodes.overview: The housemates appease the spirits of dead Native Americans. Clara seeks her daddy's approval.

episodes.name: Super Nanny
episodes.overview: Captain Hero faces off against Super Nanny, and Ling-Ling grapples with his cultural identity.

episodes.name: Terms of Endearment
episodes.overview: Captain Hero's x-ray vision makes a housemate ill. Distraught, he seeks to give up his super powers.

episodes.name: Captain Girl
episodes.overview: The death of Captain Girl forces Captain Hero to fight crime and grief solo. Toot adopts a baby.

episodes.name: A Tale of Two Cows
episodes.overview: Wooldoor makes a bovine friend in Live Action Forest as Toot heads to a reunion with Xandir.

episodes.name: Xandir and Tim, Sitting in a Tree
episodes.overview: The roommates take on Entertainment Weekly after a bad review. Captain Hero explores homosexuality.

episodes.name: The Lemon-AIDS Walk
episodes.overview: Captain Hero turns to performance-enhancing drugs. Wooldoor and Clara start a lemonade stand.

episodes.name: A Very Special Drawn Together Afterschool Special
episodes.overview: The roommates help Xandir prepare to come out to his parents, with role-playing exercises.

episodes.name: Alzheimer's That Ends Well
episodes.overview: Clara appears on "Extreme Vaginal Makeover"; demented Toot gets committed by her roommates.

episodes.name: The Drawn Together Clip Show
episodes.overview: The roommates gather for a very special clip show reunion sit-down with The Producer.

episodes.name: Freaks & Greeks
episodes.overview: Captain Hero attempts to pledge a new neighborhood Greek family, and Ling Ling's dad moves in.

episodes.name: Wooldoor Sockbat's Giggle-Wiggle Funny Tickle Non-Traditional Progressive Multicultural Roundtable!
episodes.overview: Wooldoor gets his own progressive children's TV show, and Toot chases dreams of a hot dog truck.

episodes.name: Spelling Applebee's
episodes.overview: A spelling bee forces Foxxy to confront her champion past. Clara becomes addicted to car crashes.

episodes.name: Unrestrainable Trainable
episodes.overview: Captain Hero commits to a special needs giant, and Clara goes Munchausen-by-proxy with Wooldoor.

episodes.name: N.R.A.y RAY
episodes.overview: Captain Hero stocks up on weapons after a burglary. Toot lives her food dreams.

episodes.name: Captain Hero and the Cool Kids
episodes.overview: Captain Hero must become cool in order to save the world, and Toot and Ling-Ling take up cockfighting.

episodes.name: Lost in Parking Space, Part One
episodes.overview: When the roommates depart for a trip to the mall, Clara assumes they've been Raptured.

episodes.name: Lost in Parking Space, Part Two
episodes.overview: The situation grows increasingly dire for everyone trapped in the van, and Foxxy is taken captive.

episodes.name: Charlotte's Web of Lies
episodes.overview: Captain Hero confronts a big fear after a drunk driving accident, and Ling Ling locates his inner monster.

episodes.name: Breakfast Food Killer
episodes.overview: Becoming a breakfast cereal mascot leads Wooldoor to fame and Crunch Berries addiction.

episodes.name: Drawn Together Babies
episodes.overview: The housemates take a trip back in time as tots with a taste for murder.

episodes.name: Nipple Ring-Ring Goes to Foster Care
episodes.overview: Ling-Ling enters foster care, and Captain Hero time travels in order to play a prank on his past self.

episodes.name: Toot Goes Bollywood
episodes.overview: Therapy unearths a repressed memory from Foxxy's past. Xandir gives Toot a makeover.

episodes.name: American Idol Parody Clip Show
episodes.overview: The housemates compete in musical performance in order to stay in the Drawn Together house.
episodes.production_code: Therapy unearths a repressed memory from Foxxy's past. Xandir gives Toot a makeover.
